COMMENT_TX: ej,berry101,M,steld901,Fair/foul call $Mets manager Berra ejected by 3B umpire Stello for arguing that a ball hit by MArtinez was fair

ej,grotj101,P,willa901,Bench jockeying ej,speic001,P,colon901,Harrassment of umpire ej,westw101,M,colon901,Refusing to continue game Jerry Grote ejected by HP umpire Art Williams for abusive language from the dugout; Chris Speier and Tito Fuentes were joking in the infield about this and Speier was ejected 3B umpire Nick Colosi, who thought their joking was directed at him; Colosi and Speier had argued in the previous game about a called third strike; Giants Manager Wes Westrum came onto the field to argue with Colosi about the Speier ejection; Westrum told Colosi he was carrying a grudge; Westrum ejected by Colosi
Bobby Bonds left with a strained right rib muscle
$Jerry Grote hit by Derrell Thomas' bat
ej,corrv101,P,colon901,Balls and strikes ej,kingc101,M,colon901,Balls and strikes $Braves Correll and manager King ejected by HP umpire Colosi sometime in Mets 3rd for arguing balls and strikes
ej,berry101,M,sudoe901,Checked swing Mets Manager Yogi Berra ejected by HP umpire Ed Sudol at 1:30 AM
$wild throw on pickoff; 2B umpire Bob Engel called a balk but a recent rule change allowed advances on an overthrow; previously ball was dead on a balk unless it was put in play
57 minute rain delay before start of game
Willie Stargell injured left knee sliding on passed ball in third
